title: Dexterous 6 Holes Ceramic Ocarina Soprano C Key. Easy to Carry and Learn, Good for Beginner & Great Gift. Linn's Arts! (Purple)
features: 6 Holes Ceramic Ocarina. Soprano C Key.
High temperature controlled Kiln treatment. There's no glaze inside and absorb water easily.
Excellent Sounding Quality -- rich, mellow, and warm. A guide of fingering chart, creating the notes, and basic songs are included to get you started.
Pure handmade item with esteemed master's craftsmanship. It's easy to learn and worth treasuring.
